thread.title: Starbow Adjudged Best Airline Of The Year
thread.title_full: Starbow Adjudged Best Airline Of The Year

title: Starbow Adjudged Best Airline Of The Year
text:
17:12 CET Starbow Adjudged Best Airline Of The Year By Daily Guide 
Starbow, the leading airline in the country, has been adjudged the Best Domestic Airline in Ghana for the year 2014 by the Chartered Institute of Marketing Ghana (CIMG). 
James Eric Antwi, Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Starbow, in an interview with the press after receiving the award, said that the airline has won the coveted award for the second time in a row in the wake of numerous challenges. 
He used the opportunity to pay glowing tribute to shareholders of the company for their unflinching support. 
'This award was also made possible by the unwavering patronage Starbow receives from its esteemed passengers. 
This category was initiated in 2013 by CIMG and Starbow won the maiden award. 
A Business Desk report
